document_data.name: Masked Merfolk
document_data.mainbody: The '''Masked Merfolk''' was a club in [[Marsember]], [[Cormyr]] near to [[Starwater Keep]] on [[Thelvarspike Lane]].{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20220416130132/https://candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_050607-04.htmp| title = So Saith Ed May â€“ Jul 2004| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.Structure: The door of the establishment had a carving of a [[mermaid]] and a merman embracing one another.
document_data.Staff: The club was known for having [[doppelganger]] employees who could be paid for information.
document_data.Activities: Typical entertainment consisted of [[minstrel]]s, acrobats, singers and tasting of rare [[wine]]s.
document_data.Prices:
*Information sold for 5 sp per message
*Exotic wine sold for 6 gp per glass
